main event: A round, 2-foot diameter, bright white object with a jet exhaust was seen circling in the northwest sky over Rochester, New York.
interesting points: The object was observed for 5 minutes.
The director and assistant director of the local observatory were asked to observe the phenomenon but did not see anything out of the ordinary.
The sighting was reported to Project Blue Book.
The report includes details such as the time of the sighting (2332 hours on 8 November 1957) and the weather conditions (clear).
The report seems to suggest that the sighting could not be explained.
sighted object: round, 2-foot diameter, bright white object with a jet exhaust
